attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to say that you will not accept the import and export of Israeli goods in the UK. Moreover, we urge the PM to call on all businesses in the UK to cease trading with Israel, so that they may learn a lesson from their heinous crimes. 

For the sake of Palestine, once you have signed this petition please forward this link to as many people as possible so that we may pressure the PM to take action.

UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL

God bless you all

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
